      • fixSomeVariables

        public void fixSomeVariables(ICause cause)
                      throws ContradictionException
        Description copied from interface: INeighbor
        Freezes some variables in order to have a fast computation
        Parameters:
        cause - the LNS
        Throws:
        ContradictionException - if variables have been fixed to inconsistent values this can happen if fixed variables cannot yield to a better solution than the last one a contradiction is raised because a cut has been posted on the objective function Notice that it could be used to generate a no-good
